/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes line the sidewalk, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The buildings on the right side of the street are made of brick, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the scene. On the left side of the street, there's a white building with a red roof, its vibrant colors contrasting beautifully with the surrounding greenery. 

The street itself is paved with cobblestones, adding a rustic charm to the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise timeless scene. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, capturing the essence of a peaceful day in Beijing.
